body:
Subscribe our mailing list sending an email to dev-subscribe@openserverless.apache.org
Discuss your contribution and get a ticket assigned in our [Issue Tracker](https://github.com/apache/openserverless/issues)
setup your virtual machine as described [here](https://github.com/apache/openserverless) .
Learn about [git submodules](https://git-scm.com/book/en/v2/Git-Tools-Submodules) (we use them), and use the script update-tree.sh to update your source tree to the latest version of all the branches.
Fork the subrepo you want to contribute and code your contribution.
Download and sign the [ICLA](https://www.apache.org/licenses/icla.pdf) and send to secretary@apache.org before submitting any Pull Request
Send a pull request to the relevant subrepo.
description: How to contribute to the Apache OpenServerless Project
excerpt: How to contribute to the Apache OpenServerless Project
title: Contribution Guidelines
